description: iPhone 14 and iPhone 14 Plus are currently available for purchase at a discounted price on Flipkart. Additionally, interested buyers can also avail of further discounts on selected bank cards and EMI transactions.
content: Apples iPhone 14 is available at a discounted price on Flipkart. iPhone 14 series was launched in India in September 2022 at a starting price of Rs 69,900. iPhone 14 and iPhone 14 Plus are currently … [+1714 chars]
